predict_diagnosis:
1. Spinal Muscular Atrophy (SMA)
2. Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS)
3. Multiple Sclerosis (MS)
4. Guillain-Barré Syndrome (GBS)
5. Chronic Inflammatory Demyelinating Polyneuropathy (CIDP)
6. Neuromyelitis Optica (NMO)
7. Transverse Myelitis (TM)
8. Metabolic Myopathy
9. Hereditary Spastic Paraplegia (HSP)
10. Inflammatory Neuropathy Syndrome (INS)

Please note that these top 10 diagnoses are based on the patient's reported symptoms and clinical presentation. A comprehensive clinical evaluation, laboratory tests, and imaging studies will be necessary to establish a definitive diagnosis. The list is not exhaustive, and other rare or less likely conditions may also be considered. It is important to consult with a healthcare professional for appropriate evaluation and management of the patient's condition.
